item.title: Bad HR expirience or How new repo was born
item.description: Logektor ⚡️ Forewords This repo has some background, let me tell about it. Once, quite some time ago, I came to the company on the interview, for quite good and interesting position. We were talking about what they need and what I will need to do on this position. Meeting it self was good and I was so excited about that position. But after few days I received tests assignment from them.
